name: Spartap - Pixel Endless Runner
description:
Spartap is a 2D indie endless runner game where your main hero is a Spartan warrior. A sparta game made with pixel art. Your goal is to travel through different worlds defeating mythology monsters and bosses while also gathering coins and ancient greek sparta pottery.

When defeating the boss of each world, a portal will open through which you travel to a different themed world with new creatures. The Highscore of each run can be posted online to the leaderboard where each player can compare his score to others worldwide.
It is also possible to upgrade your hero using coins in order to run further on your next try. In addition over 100 Quest-Achievements will challenge the player on his journey.

Finally it is possible to unlock a lot of skins for your Spartan to make the gameplay even more exciting! All this in hand drawn pixel art. ⚔️🏃‍♂️🐦☠️🔥

⚔️Easy Tap Controls!
🏃‍♂️Unlock hand drawn Skins!
⚔️Unique Mythology Monsters!
🏃‍♂️Dangerous Traps and Obstacles!
⚔️Pixel Art Style!
🏃‍♂️2D Endless Runner!
⚔️Upgrade your Character to run even further!
🏃‍♂️Run, Jump, Fight!
